      • createParserAndWrapException

        public static <E extends Exception> SAXParser createParserAndWrapException(boolean schemaValidation,
                                                                           Class<E> exceptionClassWrapper)
                                                                    throws E extends Exception
        Create a prser with schema validation.
        Type Parameters:
        E - the exception wrapper type.
        Parameters:
        schemaValidation - true to enable schema validation.
        exceptionClassWrapper - the exception wrapper class.
        Returns:
        a parser with schema validation enabled.
        Throws:
        E - if an error occurs.
        E extends Exception

      • getClassPathEntityResolver

        public static XMLUtil.ClassPathEntityResolver getClassPathEntityResolver()
        Get an entity resolver for resolving classpaths. This is similar to Spring's ResourceEntityResolver except that it doesn't depend on Spring and supports EntityResolver2. If you already are using Spring and do not need support for EntityResolver2 then use the Spring utility.
        Returns:
        the resolver.

      • getIdentity

        public static String getIdentity(@Nullable
                                 String xml)
                          throws IllegalStateException,
                                 IllegalArgumentException
        Get an identity string for the specified XML.
        Parameters:
        xml - the XML.
        Returns:
        the identity string.
        Throws:
        IllegalStateException - if the parser cannot be created.
        IllegalArgumentException - if the input is invalid.

      • isEmptyHTMLElement

        public static boolean isEmptyHTMLElement(String elementName)
        Return true if the specified element name is an empty element like BR, HR, etc.
        Parameters:
        elementName - the element name.
        Returns:
        true or false.

        exceptionClassWrapper - the exception class to use as a wrapper.

      • validate

        @Nullable
public static Pair<Locator,SAXException> validate(InputSource data,
                                                            @Nullable
                                                            ContentHandler contentHandler)
                                                     throws SAXException,
                                                            ParserConfigurationException,
                                                            IOException
        Validate the specified xml data.
        Parameters:
        data - the data.
        contentHandler - a content handler. This may be null.
        Returns:
        a locator and the exception on the first error or null.
        Throws:
        SAXException - thrown if parser could not be created.
        ParserConfigurationException - thrown if parser could not be created.
        IOException - thrown if data could not be read.

      • validate2

        public static List<Pair<Locator,SAXException>> validate2(InputSource data,
                                                         @Nullable
                                                         ContentHandler contentHandler)
                                                  throws SAXException,
                                                         ParserConfigurationException,
                                                         IOException
        Validate the specified xml data.
        Parameters:
        data - the data.
        contentHandler - a content handler. This may be null.
        Returns:
        a list of locator and the exception indicating errors or an empty list indicating no errors.
        Throws:
        SAXException - thrown if parser could not be created.
        ParserConfigurationException - thrown if parser could not be created.
        IOException - thrown if data could not be read.

      • writeAttributes

        public static void writeAttributes(PrintWriter writer,
                                   Attributes attributes,
                                   @Nullable
                                   Collection<String> excluded)
        Write the attributes. A space is prepend before each attribute.
        Parameters:
        writer - the writer.
        attributes - the attributes.
        excluded - the attributes to exclude.
